patch:
@@ -8,6 +8,18 @@
     android:orientation="vertical"
     tools:context=".MainActivity">
 
+    <EditText
+        android:id="@+id/EditText_keywords"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:hint="Keywords" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/Button_search"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:text="Search" />
+
     <RadioGroup
         android:id="@+id/RadioButton_expType"
         android:layout_width="match_parent"

@@ -22,12 +22,12 @@
         android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
 
     <TextView
-        android:id="@+id/TextView_region"
+        android:id="@+id/TextView_status"
         android:layout_width="match_parent"
         android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
 
     <TextView
-        android:id="@+id/TextView_numOfTrials"
+        android:id="@+id/TextView_isParticipated"
         android:layout_width="match_parent"
         android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
 </LinearLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -54,10 +54,10 @@

             </LinearLayout>

@@ -1,9 +0,0 @@

-    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
-    android:layout_width="match_parent"
-    android:layout_height="match_parent"

-
-</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

@@ -4,15 +4,43 @@
     android:layout_width="match_parent"
     android:layout_height="match_parent">
 
-
-
     <TextView
-        android:id="@+id/TextView_username"
+        android:id="@+id/Button_search"
         android:layout_width="match_parent"
         android:layout_height="wrap_content"
         android:ems="10"
         android:text="New Experiment for: " />
 
+    <RadioGroup
+        android:id="@+id/RadioGroup_expType"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content" >
+
+        <RadioButton
+            android:id="@+id/RadioButton_binomial"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="Binomial" />
+
+        <RadioButton
+            android:id="@+id/RadioButton_count"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="Count" />
+
+        <RadioButton
+            android:id="@+id/RadioButton_measurement"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="Measurement" />
+
+        <RadioButton
+            android:id="@+id/RadioButton_nonnegative"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:text="NonNegative" />
+    </RadioGroup>
+
     <EditText
         android:id="@+id/EditText_description"
         android:layout_width="match_parent"
